Key Match Events: Ja Morant scored 24 points, two assists, and six turnovers with one foul on 8-17 from the field, 2-4 from 3-point range, and 6 of 9 from the free throw line.
The Grizzlies gained some separation in the second quarter thanks to Morant's burst, scoring seven quick points in less than a minute to give Memphis a 46-40 lead.
Morant re-entered the game with two minutes left in the half, but missed three shots as the Grizzlies entered the locker room with a 65-59 lead.
In the third quarter, Morant added six more points to his tally, shooting 2 of 5, with one assist and five turnovers, as the Grizzlies trailed 98-83.
Morant added only three points and another turnover in the clutch as the Rockets' ball pressure on defense made it difficult for him to find his spots.
